prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon with light blue fur and white puffballs adorning its body.
Show me a whimsical creature that floats gracefully in the wind, resembling a cotton ball.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to dance among flowers and can float effortlessly.
Generate a cute Pokemon with round, balloon-like features and a cheerful expression.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a soft cloud, with a bright blue body and fluffy white accents.
Design a charming Pokemon that thrives in sunny meadows and enjoys the company of others.
Give me a serene Pokemon that embodies the essence of gentle breezes and soft skies.

distinctive_features: Fluffy white spheres on each side
